alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 3:57PM EST until November 27 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with up to 6 inches above 1500 foot elevation. * WHERE...Portions of west central and western Maine and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Light snowfall accumulations are expected as a period of snow impacts the region. Be prepared for variable travel conditions and slow down when you approach areas of heavier snowfall as road conditions could change rapidly with elevation. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
